title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 765-1.10 - Approval of not-for-profit corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 765-1.10 - Approval of not-for-profit corporations

State Regulations
A not-for-profit corporation seeking the approval of
the Public Health Council as the operator of a licensed home care services
agency shall provide, in addition to meeting the other applicable requirements
of this Subpart, information, documents and data as follows: (a) a photocopy of the executed existing or
proposed applicable corporate certificate which shall, in all respects, conform
to the applicable provisions of the New York State Not-for-Profit Corporation

Law and which includes corporate powers and purposes adequate to encompass the
ownership and operation of a home care services agency or agencies; and
(b) such additional pertinent
information or documents necessary for Public Health Council consideration, as
requested. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
765-1.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
